author: nhcwebmaster@noaa.gov (NHC Webmaster)
nhc_headline: ...ERIN FORECAST TO BECOME A LARGE AND FORMIDABLE MAJOR HURRICANE THIS WEEKEND...
summary: ...ERIN FORECAST TO BECOME A LARGE AND FORMIDABLE MAJOR HURRICANE THIS WEEKEND... As of 11:00 PM AST Thu Aug 14 the center of Erin was located near 17.1, -52.7 with movement WNW at 17 mph. The minimum central pressure was 998 mb with maximum sustained winds of about 70 mph.

summary_detail.value: ...ERIN FORECAST TO BECOME A LARGE AND FORMIDABLE MAJOR HURRICANE THIS WEEKEND... As of 11:00 PM AST Thu Aug 14 the center of Erin was located near 17.1, -52.7 with movement WNW at 17 mph. The minimum central pressure was 998 mb with maximum sustained winds of about 70 mph.

title: Summary - Tropical Storm Erin (AT5/AL052025)
